TITLE: DAY TRADING by ERIC EKLOF

DESCRIPTION: Member ERIC EKLOF will bring in his 4 laptops and share with our Group his DAY TRADING Style including specific details on hardware, software, trading platforms, information sites and earnings plays with examples. Also ERIC will explain his morning prep regiment along with his methods of trades, "early entry" and "timely exit" in order to maximize profits and leave less on the table! Multiple sources of HOT stocks for that day will be revealed and real day trade results will be shared.

BIO: ERIC EKLOF (who we affectionately call "Eric from Vermont") is a day-trader who attends our meetings. Over that period we have all gotten to know him as an upbeat, knowledgeable short-term trader. He is not afraid to volunteer his knowledge and opinion, often pointing out the positive contributions of others.

PREMEETING (Optional)

During the premeeting period ERIC EKLOF will also lead the meeting of the Cool-Trade Boston User's Group (CTBUG) during the premeeting (from 5:30 to 6:50) before the meeting starts. It is a way to conserve travel time & costs. Anyone is welcome to attend and you do not have to be using the software as it will be projected on the big screen to play with, explore and learn!

Those that are already using Cool Trade please bring strategies you've created for the Robot(s) to auto-trade with. If you are using any robotic trader then come! If you have questions please feel free to email ERIC direct at eklofsr@sover.net .

AGENDA

This meeting's agenda will have the following agenda:
- 5:30-6:50 ERIC EKLOF leads the Cool Trade Boston Users Group.
See above. All are welcome. This is an optional meeting.

7:00 - Meeting Begins:
- Technical Analysis update by Harlan
- Stockpicks
- Feature Presentation by ERIC EKLOF (see above)

Our members value open discussion highly. We try to pack as much open discussion as possible. Expressing ideas and sharing knowledge is paramount to our members.
All levels of expertise are welcome. No question is too simple - as a matter of fact the simplest question often evokes the best discussion!

If you talk stocks with someone then bring them with you!

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

This is a free meeting. There is no membership required, but please RSVP.
